snippet: After Turkey's Parliament approved further military action against Syria on Thursday, thousands of antiwar protesters marched to Taksim Square in the center of Istanbul.
abstract: After Turkey's Parliament approved further military action against Syria on Thursday, thousands of antiwar protesters marched to Taksim Square in the center of Istanbul.

headline.main: Protesters March Against War in Istanbul as Tension With Syria Escalates

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
